name: Shifted VR
description:
Shifted is an online-multiplayer shooter for Virtual Reality focused on tight tactical gunplay and high-intensity combat. Experience team-based action and work together to achieve victory.



Featuring robust social and matchmaking systems, finding games is effortless. Just like the experience you expect. Casual or Competitive Play, Shifted has you covered. Forge lasting friendships and communicate with ease using our built-in Voice Chat system and full Steam Integration.



With a full-scale ELO based Ranking System, automated tournaments, and a grandmaster ladder, you can prove your skill in our core game mode, Artifact. Fight to compete in the Shifted League. Our team is actively working with professionals in the existing pro-scene, to hone the ultimate competitive gaming experience in VR. - features are currently in development.



Boasting next-generation VR full-body animation, feel comfortable with an approximation of your real body, without the need for additional tracking hardware. Lose yourself in Shifted, experiencing first-hand the strife between Reyab and Colonist, and delve into the expansive lore.
